name: Greenhouse Granny
description:
Greenhouse Granny: version 1.0

The world was beautiful and peaceful, filled with life, until the appearance of horrifying mutant plants came to terrorize the city. You are the Legendary keeper of the greenhouse, a grandma who has gained infinite knowledge of plants.  These platstrosities have run rampant through the city and only seem to keep growing. You are locked in a seemingly endless battle but with your trusty spade, leaf blower, and sun hat you must persevere and save the city!
